sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, FormFeedback, Button, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter, Table } from 'reactstrap'; import EmployeeNavbar from './EmployeeNavbar'; import EmployeeSidebar from './EmployeeSidebar'; import Footer from './Footer'; import { getCustomer } from '../../actions/getCustomer'; import '../../styles/employee-dashboard.scss' import classnames from 'classnames'; const CustomerPage = () => { const [customer, setCustomer] = useState({}); const getCustomerFromState = useSelector(state => state.getCustomerReducer.customer); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('1'); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const location = useLocation(); useEffect(() => { const pathArray = location.pathname.split('/'); const customerId = pathArray[pathArray.length - 1]; dispatch(getCustomer(customerId)); }, []); useEffect(() => { if(getCustomerFromState) { console.log(getCustomerFromState) setCustomer(getCustomerFromState); }; }, [getCustomerFromState]); const toggleTab = tab => { if(activeTab !== tab) { setActiveTab(tab); }; }; return (

{customer.businessName}

{ toggleTab('1'); }}> Info { toggleTab('2') }}> Tasks { toggleTab('3') }}> Appointments { toggleTab('4') }}> Notes { toggleTab('5') }}> Employees { toggleTab('6') }}> Lifts { toggleTab('7') }}> Documents

Primary Contact

{customer.primaryContact ? customer.primaryContact.firstName : null} {customer.primaryContact ? customer.primaryContact.lastName : null}

{customer.primaryPhoneNumber}

{customer.billingContact ? customer.billingContact.firstName : null} {customer.billingContact ? customer.billingContact.lastName : null}

{customer.billingPhoneNumber}
Tasks Appointments Notes Employees Lifts Documents
); }; export default CustomerPage;
